author: slava77
body:
The implementation of `OutInConversionSeedFinder::makeTrackState` is simplified to stop computation after the result is known to be bad, which is the case for cases with zero curvature (e.g. coming from 0 Tesla field).

this somewhat indirectly addresses the situation observed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/32152#issuecomment-807871641
title: add a check for zero curvature in OutInConversionSeedFinder
